description.raw:
This air vehicle is based on the qav500 vehicle fielded by the CU team.

Sensor suite includes 1 forward facing realsense d435i and 2 pico flexx depth cameras [https://pmdtec.com/picofamily/flexx/](https://pmdtec.com/picofamily/flexx/) these sensors publish both a depth image and point clouds. To accomplish this, they are modeled as rgbd cameras in the sdf file, but only point clouds and depth images are published. Please advise if this is possible with the depth\_camera sensor type in the sdf file.

There is no light currently on the physical vehicle built by CU because it has not been necessary in the tunnel environments, but one was included here for simulation purposes

The motors for the quadrotor use the same motor model as the X4 vehicle with modifications to allow for 4 motors instead of 6. The motors on the physical vehicle are Tiger MN3510 motors [http://store-en.tmotor.com/goods.php?id=337](http://store-en.tmotor.com/goods.php?id=337)

Additional details are included in the specifications.md file
